titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd at the anniversary meeting of the sons of clergy-men in the church of St. Mary-le-Bow, on Thursday, December the 7th, 1693 printed at the request of the stewards of the feast, to whom it is humbly presented / by Edward Lake ...
titleStmt.author: Lake, Edward, 1641-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Leake for Henry Bonwicke ...,

notesStmt.note: Half-title: Dr. Lakes sermon before the sons of the clergy, December the 7th, 1693.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
